name: Treasure Moon (Snow Fox)
description:
A game made for "A Game By It's Cover" game jam!

You have traveled to the distant moon in search of Treasure. You've brought your Map of Infinite Wealth and a Shovel that never breaks! The only thing that stands in your way are the numerous Pirates that guard their treasure fiercely.

How much loot will you collect before you are overwhelmed by their forces?
